description: Detects suspicious process run from unusual locations Author: juju4, Jonhnathan Ribeiro, oscd.community. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
false_positives: False positives depend on scripts and administrative tools used in the monitored environment
name: Suspicious Process Start Locations
query: (process.executable:(*\:\\RECYCLER\\* OR *\:\\SystemVolumeInformation\\*) OR process.executable:(C\:\\Windows\\Tasks\\* OR C\:\\Windows\\debug\\* OR C\:\\Windows\\fonts\\* OR C\:\\Windows\\help\\* OR C\:\\Windows\\drivers\\* OR C\:\\Windows\\addins\\* OR C\:\\Windows\\cursors\\* OR C\:\\Windows\\system32\\tasks\\*))
